purpose.text: I strive to develop robust and intuitive web experiences that provide essential service(s) to users. To be a leader and a learner on a focused and collaborative team.

contributions: Continuously evolved frontend tools, libraries, and practices through research and prototyping
Architected frontend stack and maintained boilerplate generators
Conducted interviews and skills assessments of all frontend candidates
Trained and mentored engineering team members through on-boarding and one-on-one sessions
Developed and maintained core RED products (Scarlet and Ad Analytics) while contributing to weekly feature ideation sessions
Led development on the core Agile team for American Express OPEN Forum. Including: v1.0 - v3.0, mobile, and feature release workstreams
Helped define and maintain development best practices through code reviews, pair programming, and boilerplate/tooling evolvement
Taught an interactive development course for Miami Ad School
Collaborated with a small multi-disciplinary team from ideation to delivery
Built presentation, application, and data layers to satisfy project requirements
Guided development methods into the forefront of web standards best practices (semantic html, css layouts, unobtrusive javascript)

list.degree: Bachelor of Science, Computer Science; Minor, Information Systems
